metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9085 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple integer overflows in libwebp allows attackers to have unspecified impact via unknown vectors.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> issue is in file in examples directory, only used to build the gif2webp tool in the webp binary package in universe.

criterions.comment: libwebp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2').
